pkgmetadata.longdescription: A Self-Adaptive Approach for Demodulating Multi-Component Signal // Local Mean Decomposition is an iterative and self-adaptive approach for demodulating, processing, and analyzing multi- component amplitude modulated and frequency modulated signals. This R package is based on the approach suggested by Smith (2005) doi:10.1098/rsif.2005.0058 and the 'Python' library 'PyLMD'.
